name: Legless (shailzy)
description:
A game made for the GMTK game Jam . You are a test subject and have lost controls of your legs you can only move by using things you have!

Controls - RMB to shoot , Scroll wheel/1,2,3 - Switch weapon, Q for grenade.You can grab blue objects using the grapple gun shoot enemies with the rifle and figure out how to move using the heavy weapon
